projects.title: Automation to Implement Dynamic Database Macro
projects.technologies: VBA Macros, SQL, UiPath RPA, BOX
projects.description: Developed a VBA macro and RPA solution to automate large dataset validation for Engineering Change Management, reducing validation time and enhancing dashboard usability for site engineers.

projects.title: RPA Automation End-to-End

projects.description: Implemented end-to-end RPA automation for ECO processes, eliminating 100% manual effort and achieving 80% efficiency gains by integrating multiple tools and platforms.

projects.title: Master Data Quality Check
projects.technologies: BaaN ERP, SQL SSMS, MS Access, VBA
projects.description: Built an ETL process to extract, transform, and load data from BaaN ERP, validating customer changes against Flex BOM, reducing errors and enhancing system reliability.

projects.title: Web Task Automator
